H0.text: Which musical instrument has an Italian name fagotto which means a 'bundle of sticks'. Oboe

H1.text: Which musical instrument has an Italian name fagotto which means a 'bundle of sticks'. Clarinet

H2.text: Which musical instrument has an Italian name fagotto which means a 'bundle of sticks'. Flute

H3.text: Which musical instrument has an Italian name fagotto which means a 'bundle of sticks'. Basoon

A4.text: The term for bassoon used in classical music scores and parts is often its Italian name fagotto (plural fagotti), which referred initially to the dulcian. This word, adopted in many other European languages as fagot, fagote, or in German, Fagott, comes from an Old French word meaning a bundle of sticks.
